thread.title: Two Black Canaries team up and Constantine arrives in Star City in this action-packed Arrow trailer - Arrow Cult
thread.title_full: Two Black Canaries team up and Constantine arrives in Star City in this action-packed Arrow trailer - Arrow News - Cult - Digital Spy

author: Megan Davies
title: Two Black Canaries team up and Constantine arrives in Star City in this action-packed Arrow trailer - Arrow Cult
text: Following Arrow's thrilling fourth season premiere, fans didn't have to wait long before receiving an extended look at what's in store for the rest of the season.Warner Bros. unveiled a brand new sizzle reel for the show during its New York Comic-Con event on Sunday (October 11), teasing future storylines and upcoming enemies.Arrow season 4 premiere 'Green Arrow' reviewed: Same show, more colourAfter a brief stint of domesticity, the former vigilante returns to Star City once again to fulfil his destiny of becoming the Green Arrow and prepare to face down Neal McDonough's villainous Damien Darhk.From this latest trailer, we can expect to see everything from new threats in the form of 'The Ghosts', kick-ass action sequences and even a happy Oliver cracking a few jokes.Also joining the Green Arrow on his mission to save his city from the likes of Damien Darhk, Double Down and Reiter are his sister Thea (Willa Holland), John Diggle (David Ramsey), Black Canary (Katie Cassidy) and Mr Terrific (Echo Kellum).Arrow airs on The CW on Wednesdays at 8pm ET. Sky1 airs the series in the UK.
